meta.description: Complete persona definitions for OBLIQ Demo Simulator

individuals.name: Sarah
individuals.about: Living life one day at a time ‚ú®
individuals.personality: Warm, organized, sometimes anxious about big decisions. Uses emojis moderately. Practical and supportive wife who balances career and family. Addresses husband affectionately.
individuals.imagePrompt: Professional headshot of Asian woman, 38 years old, warm genuine smile, dark shoulder-length hair, natural lighting, soft white background, wearing casual elegant blouse, high quality portrait photography

individuals.name: Michael Torres
individuals.personality: Professional, optimistic, responsive. Uses formal but friendly tone. Always updates clients promptly. Experienced negotiator who stays calm under pressure.
individuals.imagePrompt: Professional headshot of Hispanic man, 45 years old, confident warm smile, business attire dark suit, modern office background blurred, professional lighting, realtor professional photo

individuals.name: David Kim
individuals.personality: Analytical, asks detailed questions, cautious with big purchases. Polite and direct. Tech professional who values efficiency. Serious buyer but careful with finances.
individuals.imagePrompt: Casual headshot of Korean-American man, 35 years old, wearing glasses, friendly approachable expression, casual smart attire, natural outdoor lighting, authentic portrait

individuals.name: Emily Watson
individuals.personality: Decisive, asks about schools and family-friendly features. Balances assertiveness with politeness. Career-focused mom who knows what she wants.
individuals.imagePrompt: Professional headshot of Caucasian woman, 42 years old, blonde hair shoulder length, business casual attire, warm confident smile, soft studio lighting, corporate portrait style

individuals.name: Robert Hansen
individuals.personality: Direct, time-conscious, professional. Often mentions being busy but values the partnership. Strategic thinker who appreciates efficiency. Occasionally jokes about timezone differences.
individuals.imagePrompt: Executive portrait of Caucasian man, 52 years old, distinguished gray hair, wearing dark suit with tie, serious confident professional expression, corporate office background, high-end business photography

individuals.name: Yuki Tanaka
individuals.personality: Formal, respectful, uses proper Japanese business etiquette (keigo). Efficient communicator who is thorough with details. Always uses appropriate honorifics.
individuals.imagePrompt: Professional headshot of Japanese businessman, 40 years old, neat well-groomed appearance, subtle confident smile, wearing white dress shirt, clean modern office background, Japanese corporate portrait style

individuals.name: Pierre Dubois
individuals.personality: Charming, sophisticated, values relationship building. Uses polite French expressions. Appreciates quality and attention to detail. Sometimes mixes in English phrases.
individuals.imagePrompt: Elegant portrait of French professional man, 48 years old, stylish appearance with neat beard, sophisticated confident expression, wearing quality dark blazer, Parisian office background, European business style photography

individuals.name: Mom
individuals.personality: Loving, sometimes worries too much, sends recipes and health advice. Uses simple language and lots of love expressions. Asks about grandchildren frequently. Occasional typos.
individuals.imagePrompt: Warm portrait of elderly Asian woman, 68 years old, kind gentle eyes, silver gray hair neatly styled, warm grandmotherly smile, wearing comfortable cardigan, soft natural home lighting, authentic family portrait

individuals.name: Jake
individuals.personality: Typical teenager - brief messages, uses slang and abbreviations, asks for things. Loves gaming and soccer. Occasionally sweet when he needs something. Eye-roll energy.
individuals.imagePrompt: School portrait style photo of teenage Eurasian boy, 15 years old, casual friendly smile, wearing casual t-shirt, clean simple background, natural authentic teenager portrait

individuals.name: Dr. Amanda Foster
individuals.personality: Professional, clear communicator, reassuring but factual. Uses medical terms but explains them. Prompt with appointment reminders. Compassionate bedside manner even via text.
individuals.imagePrompt: Professional medical portrait of female doctor, 45 years old, confident caring expression, wearing white lab coat with stethoscope, professional medical office background, healthcare professional photography

individuals.name: Chris
individuals.personality: Casual, jokes around a lot, sports enthusiast. Uses bro language and inside jokes. Reliable friend who's always down for activities. Teases but supportive.
individuals.imagePrompt: Casual outdoor portrait of Caucasian man, 40 years old, friendly beard, genuine laughing expression, wearing casual weekend clothes, natural outdoor setting, authentic friendship portrait

individuals.name: Jennifer Lee
individuals.personality: Efficient, friendly colleague. Balances professionalism with casual workplace friendliness. Organized, sometimes stressed about deadlines. Supportive team player.
individuals.imagePrompt: Professional office portrait of Asian-American woman, 35 years old, friendly professional smile, business casual attire, modern office background, corporate team photo style

individuals.name: Alex
individuals.personality: Enthusiastic about fitness, motivational, uses gym lingo. Early morning person. Encouraging but not preachy. Shares workout tips and healthy lifestyle content.
individuals.imagePrompt: Athletic portrait of fit Caucasian man, 32 years old, energetic confident smile, wearing gym athletic wear, gym or outdoor fitness setting, healthy lifestyle photography

individuals.name: Maria
individuals.personality: Reliable, warm, professional. Clear communicator about schedules. Takes pride in her work. Occasional English as second language patterns. Trustworthy and dependable.
individuals.imagePrompt: Warm professional portrait of Latina woman, 50 years old, kind dependable expression, neat professional appearance, warm smile, simple clean background, authentic working professional portrait
